channel.title: Header & Footer on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Header & Footer on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Check links in header
item.description: Check links in header Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Click on top left link “Contact us” Contact form page will open Click on Sign In button >Â Enter your email + password > Click Sign In You are now logged in Button “Sign In” is now 2 buttons : “Sign Out” + “your name” Click on your account button in header Your account page is displayed Go to a product page > Add to cart > Click “Continue shopping” > Click on top right Cart button Shopping cart is now displayed Click on Sign out You will be logged out and the cart is now empty

item.title: Check links in footer
item.description: Check links in footer Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Go to footer See 4 blocks : Products, Our company, Your account and Store Information Check that all links from Products, Our company work well and redirect to correct page Case 1 : you are not logged in On block Your account, Click on all links All links should redirect to Login Page Case 2 ; you are logged into your customer account All links will redirect to the correct page On block Store information > Click on the email address You will be able to send a direct email

item.title: Change language
item.description: Change language Steps Step Description Expected result Case 1 : there’s only one language You will not see the link to change language in the header Case 2 : If you have 2 or more languages Go to FO > Change language from EN to FR See that the page is not in FR The url has the /fr/ Switch back to EN FO is now in English

item.title: Change currency
item.description: Change currency Steps Step Description Expected result Case 1 : You have one currency only The link to change currency will not appear in header of FO Case 2 : You have 2 or more currencies Go to FO > Click on your current currency > Switch to another currency See that the price of your product is now in the new currency with the new exchange rate Switch back to your original currency The prices of products are now in the original currency with the original exchange rate
